fullDescription: Ana Luisa crafts sustainable jewelry with timeless elegance. We redesigned their website to match their ethos, focusing on visual appeal and user-friendly design. This transformation brings their commitment to quality and eco-friendliness to the forefront, offering an online experience that truly reflects the essence of the brand.

layout.title: What's Your One Big Thing?
text: In most ecommerce businesses, there's are an endless amount of things to be worked on. But usually, there's One Big Thing that, if you get it right, can really help your business grow.  This is often something you already have a hunch about. Fast-growing companies are often those that identify and overcome their biggest roadblocks.

Chances are, your website has its own One Big Thing too. For some, it might be smoothing out the checkout process. For others, better product images could be the game-changer. Pinpointing and improving these areas can do wonders for your customer engagement.

layout.title: Elevating Ana Luisa's Digital Persona
text: For Ana Luisa, the big change was elevating the visual design of their website. Before, it was decent but not very memorable. The brand voice was missing. We helped them develop a distinct visual identity that they could own. Now, when people visit their site, it feels more exclusive and less ordinary.

Post-makeover, our focus shifted to usability. We brought their product categories into the spotlight for easier navigation. We trimmed the homepage by a third too. Research shows that less is more in terms of engaging visitors.

layout.title: Turning Browsers into Buyers
text: Each tweak, each adjustment, while small in isolation, collectively makes a significant impact. These kinds of enhancements often lead to a sales boost, sometimes by as much as 10% to 20%.
